violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
I think the name is fine, in the category of "less systematic names". In my book, pronounceable acronyms make perfectly fine package names, and all-caps are okay in that situation (we'd accept `Boss`, so we should also accept `BOSS`).

However, it will need a manual merge, so ping the `#pkg-registration` channel on Slack after the end of the tree-day waiting period.

[noblock]

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: [noblock] The compat issues have to be fixed before this can be merged, of course.
